22656.name: Private Components
22656.description:
Hide/Show all the private components in your file with one click.


In Design Systems adding a "_" or "." to the beginning of the name to hide components from libraries is a smart way to keep complex components separated from their smaller parts.

 

In some cases you'll also want to hide those secondary components from the design system user's eye so he doesn't get distracted with secondary information.

 

This plugin simply hides and shows all the private components for you.

21547.name: Berrycast
21547.description:
Our mission is to make every second of your life more productive. And we believe that starts with clear communications and appropriate tools.


 To fulfill our mission, Berrycast helps you share video messages using your screen, your voice, and your face to support your message. Byebye misunderstandings! Create and share clear video messages in less time than it would take to type an email.

21028.name: MP Asset Generator
21028.description:
This plugin allows you to update the styles and logos of Marriage Pact assets to reuse your design for other colleges. Aside from creating two components and changing paint styles, this plugin will not mutate your Figma file in any way.


Colors

Your file should already have color styles with a hierarchy relatively like "[Print/Digital/Text] > [Primary/Secondary]". If not, clicking any colored square should initialize them with the appropriate brand colors.


Logo

When clicking "Update Logo", the plugin looks for the group "Logos/Editable Digital Logo" on the first page and creates (or updates) the components "Digital Logo" and "Print Logo", which are scalable copies of whatever lies in Editable Digital Logo.


If your file doesn't have any such component, "Update Logo" will display an error in the plugin, and no action will be taken.


---

If you have any questions, feel free to contact jerryh2@stanford.edu.

20512.name: Localiser
20512.description:
Localiser gives you the ability to translate the text elements to another one by importing the translations from google sheets. 


You can export all the text elements from current page to a csv file. 

Use the spreadsheet link to import the spreadsheet data to your plugin, which then displays the available languages. (Languages added in the sheet will be picked up. Check the example of sheet below)

On selecting the language, the text elements will change to the new text provided in the sheet. 


What your google sheet should contain:

  1. id's of the text elements of the figma page. (Column 1)
  2. Current language text. (Column 2)
  3. New language converted text. (Rest of the Columns)


id | English | Hindi | Tamil

1:39 | All Subjects | सभी विषयों | அனைத்து பாடங்களும்

.

.

.... so on and so forth.

19593.name: StuDocreator
19593.description:
A small text generator for books, courses and documents.


To generate this text, simply have text fields selected and click on whichever data you want to generate.


Example: If you want to generate a Document Title, select a text field and click on the 'Title' button under the 'Documents' section.

If you want to generate a Book Author, select a text field and click on the 'Author' button under the 'Books' section.


If you would like to generate all the data of a section, for example the Title, Course and Institution of a Document, you need to have three text fields selected each named appropriately. The fields should be named by section and type, so section_type


Example. Select 3 text fields named

  1. document_title
  2. document_course
  3. document_institution

And click on the Document button in the Documents tab. This will generate all information into these text fields.

19127.name: Wantedly Preflight
19127.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ― You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ― Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ― Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

21927.name: Generate Placeholder Text
21927.description:
Quickly create some lorem ipsum placeholder text.


How to use:

  • Call the plugin while selecting an existing text box to change its contents to lorem ipsum placeholder text.
  • Call the plugin anywhere else to create a new textbox with lorem ipsum placeholder text.


That's it!


Help me help you

If you have any questions, feedback, or bug reports with the plugin, feel free to get in touch via the "Support" email under the Details section.

21293.name: @sposhe/reorder
21293.description:
Reorder a frame's children by their X or Y position (from right to left, top to bottom, etc).


To use:


  1. Select one or more frames with child nodes.
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Select a direction and press "Reorder"

21710.name: cronos
21710.description: With this plugin you can measure time, the design still looks terrible, I know, but i'll work on that
21710.release_notes: Centralized time, I'll do more design later

21734.name: A Replacer
21734.description:
You can replace the layer with a custom element, and the replaced layer will inherit the size attribute.


你可以用自定义的元素替图层，被替换的图层会继承尺寸属性。


使用方式：

选择一个元素，然后将其添加到“替换源”列表

选择需要被替换的元素，然后点击“替换源”列表中的元素。

可以在“替换源”列表中预先添加多个需要的替换元素

每个文档的“替换源”都是私有的


你可以通过将组件添加到“替换源”来将其他元素替换为该组件的实例，如果需要添加团队组件，请将组件的实例添加到文档后将该实例添加为“替换源”


Usage:


Select an element and add it to the replace source list


Select the element to be replaced, and then click the element in the "replacement source" list.


You can add multiple required replacement elements in the replacement source list in advance


The "replacement source" of each document is private


You can replace other elements with instances of the component by adding the component to the "replacement source". If you need to add a team component, please add the instance of the component to the document and add the instance as the "replacement source"

22102.name: rename layers 重命名图层
22102.description:
rename selected layers. note：if new name is empty,only text layers will be rename from characters


重命名图层，注意：如果输入框的内容为空，那么将自动识别文本图层的内容并以此来命名文本图层(非文本图层则跳过)

22044.name: Allto››layout
22044.description:
Update all auto-layout properties across your entire current active page. No more random instances of 18px item-spacing, or the odd 22px left padding.


No need to hunt down all those frames, highlight them and change the properties. Also no need to dig into those auto-layout child frames that live inside auto-layout parent frames.


Type once, change them all in an instant.

22088.name: Layout Handoff
22088.description:
Select frames or variants, run the plugin and in a blink of an eye, you will have 3 frames of each selection with borders around the children frames and variants.

 

Each frame created is one nesting level deeper than the other.

the 4th and the last frame (furthest to the right) will contain all the variants of components found in each selection.

 

With the help of this plugin, the developer and the designer will have the ability to see clearly the layout of each frame and the variants of components that were used to build it.

 

All that without extra effort.

 

 

 

**Credits go to @aravinddesign for the design used in the cover art - taken from the Landify UI kit.
